ygData.subject: RE:  Disturbing thoughts.....
ygData.msgSnippet: i checked last night, wondering what i could change.  all i could think of was removing my plat fire emerald rings and getting 2 jagged bands, effect -4str,
ygData.messageBody:
i checked last night, wondering what i could change. all i could think of
was removing my plat fire emerald rings and getting 2 jagged bands, effect
-4str, -10dex, +10AC (more overall from modifier). not sure if i wanna do
that. i may go with 1 jagged band and 1 7cha/5dex ring. my CHA is very
low, but then i lose 7str. what i really want is a runed lava pendant, but
i can not afford one nor do i really want to camp it. anyone know what they
go for?

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L36 High Elf Wizard (3X@35 yesterday hehe)
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

P.S. Harm the Tranix crown is definitely NOT (caps just for you) no drop.
the only things no drop on FGs are mithril torque and mask and skarlon
sword. did that cleric loot one of those?


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>
> It's funny that you mention that, I'm going to cut my dex/cha down
> and go with more str/ac too. hehe.
>
> Harm.
